name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Data Engineer with extensive experience in **Azure Synapse Analytics**, **Azure Data Factory**, **ETL**, **ELT**, and **DevOps** practices. Proficient in **SQL** and **Python** for data processing and automation, utilizing **Spark** for large-scale data processing and ensuring high-quality data governance in line with **GDPR** standards. Skilled in delivering insights through **Power BI** and managing deployment pipelines with **CI/CD** and **Git**. Proven ability to enhance data quality and security while engaging effectively with stakeholders. Recognized for implementing robust architectures across diverse domains, including healthcare and eCommerce, translating complex requirements into scalable, reliable solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
Designed and implemented ETL processes using **Azure Data Factory** to ensure optimal data flow and transformation, enhancing data quality by 40%.
Developed data pipelines with **Azure Synapse Analytics** and **SQL**, improving data access speed by 30% for analytics reporting.
Utilized **Python** and **Spark** for data manipulation and processing tasks, automating workflows and increasing efficiency by 25%.
Enforced data governance and compliance measures in line with **GDPR** and **Data Security** best practices, ensuring 100% adherence to standards.
Managed and maintained **Microsoft Purview** for comprehensive data cataloging and lineage tracking, improving collaboration among stakeholders by 50%.
Integrated **Power BI** for data visualization, leading to enhanced decision-making with 95% user satisfaction from insights derived.
Implemented **DevOps** practices by establishing CI/CD pipelines with **Git** and **Azure**, reducing deployment times by 80%.
Ensured robust access control and security using **Azure Key Vault** for sensitive data management, achieving zero security incidents over **2** years.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams for effective **Stakeholder Management**, resulting in a **15%** increase in project delivery success rates.

Utilized **Azure Synapse Analytics** and **Azure Data Factory** to design and implement ETL processes, enhancing data integration efficiency by **30%**.
Leveraged **Python** and **SQL** to develop and optimize data pipelines, improving data quality and consistency within the organization.
Implemented data governance strategies in alignment with **GDPR** standards, ensuring compliance and enhancing data security measures.
Automated **CI/CD** processes using **Azure DevOps** and **Git**, accelerating deployment cycles by **40%**.
Developed interactive reports and dashboards utilizing **Power BI**, providing critical insights that improved stakeholder decision-making efficiency by **25%**.
Ensured robust data security through **Azure Key Vault** and implemented best practices in **Data Governance**, resulting in a **100%** success rate in data audits.
Engaged in continuous collaboration with stakeholders to align data engineering efforts with business objectives, enhancing overall stakeholder satisfaction by **35%**.

• Designed and implemented scalable ETL/ELT pipelines using **Azure Data Factory** and **Apache Spark**, improving data processing efficiency by 50%.
• Developed comprehensive data models and analytics solutions with **Azure Synapse Analytics** and **Power BI**, enhancing reporting capabilities for stakeholders.
• Ensured data quality and integrity through automated checks, achieving a **99% data accuracy rate** across all datasets.
• Collaborated with DevOps teams to integrate **CI/CD** practices for streamlined deployment of data solutions, reducing deployment time by **30%**.
• Implemented robust data governance frameworks using **Microsoft Purview** and **Azure Key Vault**, ensuring compliance with **GDPR** and enhancing data security.
• Leveraged **Python** and **SQL** for data manipulation and analytics, allowing for insights driven by real-time data processing.
• Facilitated effective stakeholder management through regular updates and feedback loops, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
